node.title: Wellington Phoenix players in isolation after positive tests detected within men's squad
node.description: The rest of the squad is still scheduled to travel to South Australia for Saturday's league clash against Adelaide United.
node.content: ["A COVID-19 crisis is brewing within the Wellington Phoenix with the club confirming positive cases inside the men's squad.", "On Thursday, the club announced two players and a staff member had tested positive for the virus and are isolating away from the rest of the squad.", "The Phoenix have a game scheduled for Saturday against Adelaide United and the remainder of the team is still planning on traveling to South Australia on Friday.", "The club says it is following A-League COVID protocols that include screening and detecting for the virus and if positive cases are confirmed, immediate isolation will be enforced.", "Saturday night's game against Adelaide could be in doubt if further cases are detected within the squad."]
